text: Dominican Republic national football team is the national football team of Dominican Republic, and is controlled by the Dominican Football Federation. The team has never featured globally. Football is a popular sport in the country recently, where the main sport is baseball. The Dominican assembly made history when in October 2010 a scandalous thrashed 17-0 British Virgin Islands, with the biggest victory in the history of the CONCACAF. ==References== Category:Caribbean national football teams Category:Sport in the Dominican Republic Category:National sports teams of the Dominican Republic
title: Dominican Republic national football team
